about_the_game:
You thought you were the only rock climbing hipster around, but these mountains are full of them. Eliminate all competition and claim your rock!
Climb, an online multiplayer brawler with short and action packed game sessions!

We are releasing Climb to the public to see if a fast paced deathmatch game is what the players want (also because it is fun to play!).
We seek your feedback and wishes for upcoming features such as:
  • Mechanics
  • Levels
  • Steam functions (workshop, leaderboards, achievements, etc)
  • Customization items etc

See you in the forums!

name: Climb

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 Dual Core CPU, 2+GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Ti / ATI Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 Quad Core CPU, 3+GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / ATI Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection
